title: Firstborn
description: A powerful contemporary novel from award-winning author Robin Lee Hatcherâ€”now available in softcover. Erika's worst fear is realized when her well-kept secret shows up on her doorstep. As she reaches out to the daughter she gave up for adoption 21 years ago, her husband pulls away, leaving Erika with an impossible choice. This emotionally gripping story will touch and challenge readers.
author: Robin Lee Hatcher
